Summary: Two objects enter the atmosphere, going form dim to bright and dim again going south.
divs: Sighting DetailsTwo objects enter the atmosphere, going form dim to bright and dim again going south. The neighbors my wife and I see the event. clearly looked like two crafts entering the atmosphere. I have seen this twice in Hughson were I live in the last 5 years, and one time at Pajaro Dunes California from the beach. The Pajaro Dunes event was one object . each times the objects go south and become dim and can no longer be seen, fast moving .
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Hughson
There were no other sightings in Hughson on or around July 1st 2007
